forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A wind driven heavy rain. High 16C. Winds S at 55 to 80 km/h, becoming W and decreasing to 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 50 to 75mm of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain, heavy at times. High 62F. Winds S at 40 to 60 mph, becoming WNW and decreasing to 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 2 to 3 inches of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 15C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 59F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Abundant sunshine. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High around 15C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High around 60F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 59F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some evening light rain. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. Partial clearing late. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 59F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 61F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High near 60F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.
